doc.title: Star Stuff
doc.plot: Since the brother Grimms a lot of water has gone under the bridge.Especially under the Brooklyne Bridge!The trees have been transmuted into skyscrapers, the nice forest dwarfs have become a street gang and the only thing white about Snow White now is the sweet sparkling powder that she necks down by the packet : the STAR STUFF The only one to stay the same is the Nasty Witch., malicious, vain, who'll stop at nothing to preserve her reign 10 blocks around...
